text: is a Japanese Nintendo-owned video game development company in Tokyo, Japan. They were formed by ex-employees of Square Co. who worked on games in the Mana series. ==Games== ===Game Boy Advance=== *Magical Vacation *Sword of Mana *Mother 3 ===Nintendo DS=== *Magical Starsign *Heroes of Mana *Blue Dragon Plus Category:Nintendo Category:2000 establishments in Japan
title: Brownie Brown
